thread.title: Maria
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Maria

author: Maria
title: Maria
text:
Ashley handled our (i would say) embarassing moment of our life in a perfect manner. Her job suits her ideally. She never let us feel uncomfortable towards the situation instead she listens and make us feel at ease all throughout the process. She gives us answer to all our inquiry in a timely manner.
David Sklar & Associates Inc is well recommended to all who needs a new and fresh start.
Thank you very much!
